message: I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a fair starting point, and we can always negotiate further.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is more fair. We can continue to negotiate, but I don't want to get bogged down in too many rounds.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money, especially with the inflation affecting us both. Let's end this game on a neutral note.
